abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of: (a) the
            construction, furnishing, and equipping of: (i) an
            Elementary Vocational Training Center; (ii) a Technician
            Training Institute; (iii) 10 laboratories as additions to
            two Senior Secondary General Schools; and (iv) an Elementary
            Teacher Training College. (b) technical assistance for
            project implementation and curricula development.
